MrMatt the Sonnet Master
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Assorted Non-Monster Rancher Fiction: MrMatt the Sonnet Master
By MrMatt3000 on Wednesday, February 6, 2002 - 09:58 pm:

Valor

Constrained by fear and all alone at night,
the armored one pursues the dark mist far.
The will to fight and right what's wrong takes flight,
who shall not make the fearless soul be charred.
The crystal sword brings horror to its end,
defeating insolence in his pursuit.
The knight brings terror to time's great bend,
unveils his saviors with a golden hue.
Instilling every mortal's hopeful soul,
the knight shall vanquish every fearful thought.
Impales nightmares with an eternal hole,
the valor and his knight forever brought.
Courageous ally, the knight is your hope,
not once again shall fearful thoughts provoke.


That was one of my better ones.

~~~BatMatt~~~
